title: Great Support.
desc: We've got you covered. Your Theme comes with awesome support to give you a helping hand when needed.

title: Detailed Documentation
desc: We've provide detailed documentation to help you along the way.

title: Qazana Page Builder
desc: A truly live real-time page builder will allow you to fill your website with content page by page in a matter of minutes.

title: WordPress Live Customizer
desc: Make changes to your website and see instant changes with live customizer tool.

title: Powerful Functionality
desc: We've integrated your Theme with cool free plugins that help to create full a functional business website.

title: WooCommerce Ready
desc: Create your online shop in few clicks. Your Theme supports the last version of WooCommerce out of the box.
